rooms.description: Modern open living space with minimalistic design and ample natural light.
Adjacent to the living room for seamless flow, designed for formal dining events.
Functional kitchen with integrated cabinetry and energy-efficient appliances.
Spacious master bedroom with Vastu-compliant placement on the northeast corner for positive energy.
Second bedroom positioned on the southwest side, ensuring privacy and natural light.
Third bedroom for additional space with adequate ventilation.
Fourth bedroom designed to be compact yet comfortable with efficient use of space.
Fully functional bathroom integrated within the master suite, adhering to modern standards and accessibility guidelines.
Compact utility room for storage of household appliances, designed with efficiency in mind.

openings.description: Main entrance designed to face the northeast for auspicious energy flow.
Secondary entrance leading to garden area and swimming pool access.

garden.description: Large garden with indigenous plants, pathways, and a designated space for the swimming pool, designed to maximize greenery in line with Vastu principles.

pool.description: Modern swimming pool integrated into the garden with eco-friendly water circulation system and minimal maintenance design.

rooms.description: Cozy study area with ample natural light and ergonomic furniture.
Guest bedroom designed for comfort with Vastu-compliant orientation on the northwest side.
Separate guest bathroom ensuring privacy and convenience.

openings.description: Larger windows on the upper floor to provide abundant natural light and maintain an open feel.
